name: Seared Scallops with Noodles, Chilli, Garlic and Coriander
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cm piece of root ginger cut into slithers,
a few drops of sesame oil.
recipeInstructions: 1. Bring a pan of lightly salted water to the boil, add the noodles, then turn off the heat and leave for 4 minutes, then drain.
2. Add 1 tbsp oil to a frying pan over a medium low heat. Add the garlic, chilli and ginger and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring frequently until softened. Remove from the pan and set aside.
3. Increase the heat and add the rest of the oil. Fry the scallops for 20 seconds on each side, until lightly browned. Set the scallops aside.
4. Add the noodles, garlic and chilli to the pan. Add the soy sauce. Stir until coated. Add the scallops, sesame oil and coriander. Toss gently and serve.
